sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"不同意，反对"之意。
means: disagree ： 指彼此间意见或看法不同，任何言行上的不合。
differ ： 可替换disagree，但语气较温和，是disagree的委婉说法。
object ： 语气强烈，侧重对某一具体计划、行为或作法等表示反对。常跟前置词to连用。

sentence.Network_en: You and I are going to have to agree to disagree then.
sentence.Network_cn: 那你我只能各自保留不同意见了。

sentence.Network_en: I disagree with Andrew Russell over his piece on British Rail.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不同意安德鲁·拉塞尔那篇关于英国铁路公司的文章。

sentence.Network_en: Rarely does a grand jury publicly disagree with a prosecutor.
sentence.Network_cn: 大陪审团公开反对公诉人意见的情况很少见。

disaffect 使生恶感,使生二心,使疏远disagree 不一致,争论disapprove 非难,不准许,不赞成

list.abs: That may be true.I disagree.　我不同意。I don't agree.
disagree... ... disagree with 和。。。意见一致跟人 disagree on 众议纷纭 disagree with 与…意见不一致（人） 不同意.
香水广告对消费者行为的影响问卷 - 知己知彼网 ... 中肯 Neutual 非常不同意 Strongly Disagree 电视 Television.
...用来描述会员对于调查各个项目的回答。采用5分制,从强烈反对(strongly disagree)到强烈赞同(strongly agree),3分为可疑(equivocal)。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in sense 2, also in the sense 'refuse to agree to'): from Old French desagreer

entry.tran: 不同意;有分歧;意见不合
entry.def: If you disagree with someone or disagree with what they say, you do not accept that what they say is true or correct. You can also say that two people disagree .

example.ex: You must continue to see them no matter how much you may disagree with them...
example.tran: 无论你和他们之间有多大的分歧，你都得继续去看他们。

example.ex: They can communicate even when they strongly disagree...
example.tran: 即便在有很大分歧时，他们也还是能够交流。

entry.def: If you disagree with a particular action or proposal, you disapprove of it and believe that it is wrong.

example.ex: I respect the president but I disagree with his decision...
example.tran: 我尊敬总统，但我反对他的这个决定。

example.ex: I disagree with drug laws in general.
example.tran: 总的来说，我反对药品法。

entry.tran: (尤指食物)对…不适宜，使…身体不适，不合…胃口
entry.def: If a particular food or drink disagrees with you, it makes you feel unwell.

example.ex: Orange juice seems to disagree with some babies.
example.tran: 橙汁似乎不适合某些婴儿饮用。

sentences.sentence: "She disagrees with her husband on many questions"

auth_sentence.content: Therefore, I totally disagree with you and Wombatdeath.
auth_sentence.res_content: Therefore, I totally disagree with you and Wombatdeath.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Therefore, I totally disagree with you and Wombatdeath.

auth_sentence.content: But other experts still disagree that a link exists.
auth_sentence.res_content: But other experts still disagree that a link exists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But other experts still disagree that a link exists.

auth_sentence.content: I wouldn't disagree with them, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: I wouldn't disagree with them, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I wouldn't disagree with them, he said.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 符合的;一致的;欣然同意的;令人愉快的
stems_affixes.word_buile: a+gree感激,高兴+able可以……的→adj.符合的;一致的;欣然同意的;令人愉快的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 协定;协议;契约;达成协议;同意,一致
stems_affixes.word_buile: agree[v.同意, 赞成……的意见, 与……一致, 承认, 适合]+ment行为或结果→n.协定;协议;契约;达成协议;同意,一致

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同意, 赞成……的意见, 与……一致, 承认, 适合
stems_affixes.word_buile: a+gree感激,高兴→因为感激[或高兴],所以同意
dis分开,去掉,不+agree同意→v.有分歧;不一致

Sentence.sentence: Reasonable people may disagree about whom to blame.
About 68% of those surveyed disagreed with the opinion that reading isboring or old-fashioned.
Many scientists disagree about what the differences are between the alcohol addict and social drinker.
I strongly disagree with this approach.
Surrounded by open ocean, it is also vulnerable, but Antarctic experts disagree strongly on just how unstable it is.

means.word_mean: 不同意, 不一致, 持不同意见, 有分歧

sentences.en: He likes to fight it out whenever others disagree with him.
sentences.cn: 当别人与他意见不一致时, 他总喜欢争辩个明白。

jushi.chinese: 即使是朋友有时也会意见不合。

jushi.english: I'm sorry to disagree with you.
jushi.chinese: 很抱歉,我不同意你的意见。
